articles.title: NBA playoffs: Kings race away from Warriors to force winner-take-all Game 7 - The Guardian
articles.description: Sacramento staved off elimination in their first-round playoff series by beating Stephen Curry and Golden State 118-99 on Friday night in Game 6
articles.content: Malik Monk scored 28 points, DeAaron Fox added 26 points and 11 assists, and the Sacramento Kings staved off elimination in their first-round playoff series by beating Stephen Curry and the Golden St… [+2356 chars]

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Titans end Will Levis' long wait after trading up on day two of NFL draft - The Guardian
articles.description: The Titans ended Will Levis’ wait, trading up eight spots with Arizona to select the Kentucky quarterback with the No 33 pick on Friday in the NFL draft
articles.content:
Will Levis didnt stick around to hear his name called after slipping out of the first round. He wouldnt have waited long.
The Tennessee Titans traded up to get the second pick of the second round an… [+3443 chars]
